known_issues: Navigation bug: clicking links does not open the destination page scrolled to the top (scroll position not reset on route change).

existing_features.title: Ensure that when a user navigates to a different route by clicking any internal link (header nav, footer links, in-page CTAs), the destination page loads scrolled to the top (window scroll position resets to 0,0).

projectName: Fix scroll position not resetting to top on navigation
